name: Hamilton's Hamster Cafe
description:
Welcome to Hamilton's Hamster Cafe.

1. It's busy today! The Hamsters food order will be located above the Hamsters head.

2. Click and drag the food to the Hamsters mouth in the correct order and within the given time to fulfil the order.

3. Be quick though! The cafe is getting busier by the second. We can't have any delays.

4. Help us out by filling in this survey -

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1OFF2veNARVKhY6x4bZ9BZ9qhOWruVwsObngbTkjKhuA/edi...
